attributes.action: A referendum on whether to have a second referendum
attributes.additional_details: We are in a total mess and everyone is sick of hearing about Brexit.
attributes.background:
The country is split and we can’t agree on anything. We are assuming that the remain voters want a second referendum and the leave voters don’t.

This could well not be the case and given the people may have changed their minds either way we need to find out.

This would give a definitive answer
